channel.title: Blogs on Rotational
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Rotational

item.title: Documenting a gRPC API with OpenAPI
item.description: gRPC makes the specification and implementation of networked APIs a snap. But what is the simplest way to document a gRPC API?

item.title: Why UX Will Get Worse Before it Gets Better
item.description: The things we make are not user-friendly by accident; we have to make them that way.

item.title: The Actor Model
item.description: Building correct concurrent programs in a distributed system with multiple threads and processes can quickly become very complex to reason about.
